title: Looking for clash team with players in silver/gold
body:
Looking to play clash on saturday either as a one off or maybe as an ongoing thing, if i can find the right group of people, and if riot actually makes clash work this time lol.

Im no pro or anything myself so looking for players in the silver/gold range, the highest rank i've ever gotten was gold 5. I don't care if the people i play with aren't particularly good, just as long as we don't get mad at the game or each other if we lose, and don't take it TOO seriously, but playing to win of course.

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=OrangeRuffy

Summoner Name: Orangeruffy, add me and message me if you are interested, i main support and thats what i intend to play.

Edit: I have found and joined a team, we have 4/5, need only a jungler. Message Ivery (our team captain) for an invite.
